DOC.brief_summary: The investigaotors want to establish a real-time and computerized score reporting system based on the significant predictors of the measured sonographic parameters and demographic data.
DOC.brief_title: A Real-time and Computerized Sonographic Reporting System in Predicting Malignant Cervical Lymphadenopathy
DOC.detailed_description: One hundred eight patients with neck lymphadenopathy, receiving ultrasonography and ultrasound-guided fine-needle aspiration (US-FNA), were used to construct a predictive model. This model was validated by another independent patient cohort.
DOC.criteria: Patients with previously untreated neck masses underwent neck US The neck mass was not lymph node No USFNA cytology result
